src:
Senin Depan, Komisi I Gelar Rapat Perdana dengan Menhan
07 Nov 2019, 19:51 by iman


Senin Depan, Komisi I Gelar Rapat Perdana dengan Menhan

KBRN, Jakarta: Komisi I DPR RI berencana akan menggelar rapat kerja dengan Menteri Pertahanan Prabowo Subianto  pada Senin (11/11/2019). Bagi Komisi I DPR, rapat kerja  ini merupakan rapat kerja perdana setelah Prabowo Subianto diangkat menjadi Menteri Pertahanan.  "Komisi I DPR akan memanggil Menhan Prabowo Subianto, pada Senin (11/11/2019) pukul 10.00 WIB. Melalui komunikasi antara Sekretariat Komisi 1 DPR dan Kemhan, Pak Prabowo menyatakan akan hadir dan akan didampingi Wamen," kata Meutya Hafid dalam keterangan tertulisnya di Jakarta, Kamis (7/11).Rapat kerja perdana Komisi I DPR dengan Kemhan akan dihadiri Menhan Prabowo Subianto beserta jajarannya termasuk Wakil Menteri Pertahanan (Wamenhan) Wahyu Sakti Trenggono.Menurut Meutya Hafid, rapat Komisi I DPR dengan Kemhan akan membahas soal kebijakan Kemhan dan strategi pertahanan negara yang akan disampaikan Menhan Prabowo Subianto."Hal hal yang terkait kebijakan umum Kemhan dapat disampaikan dalam rapat terbuka. Namun, yang terkait strategi dan rahasia negara tentu disampaikan secara tertutup," ujarnya.Politisi Partai Golkar itu juga optimis rapat kerja perdana Komisi I DPR dengan Kemhan akan berjalan lancar, terlebih publik dan media juga menunggu kehadiran Prabowo Subianto sebagai Menhan untuk hadir di DPR."Sebagai pimpinan Komisi I DPR, saya berharap rapat kerja perdana ini akan berjalan dengan lancar. Saya juga yakin Komisi I DPR dan Pak Prabowo Subianto akan dapat menjalankan kemitraan yang baik dan saling menghormati," pungkas Meutya.
text:
Next Monday, Commission I Holds First Meeting with Minister of Defense
Nov. 07 2019, 19:51 by faith


Next Monday, Commission I Holds First Meeting with Minister of Defense

KBRN, Jakarta: House of Representatives Commission I plans to hold a working meeting with Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto on Monday (11/11/2019). For the DPR's Commission I, this working meeting was the first working meeting after Prabowo Subianto was appointed Minister of Defense. "Commission I of the DPR will summon Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto, Monday (11/11/2019) at 10:00 WIB. Through communication between the DPR Commission 1 Secretariat and the Ministry of Defense, Pak Prabowo said he would attend and be accompanied by the Vice Minister," Meutya Hafid said in his written statement. in Jakarta, Thursday (7/11). The DPR's Commission I first working meeting with the Ministry of Defense will be attended by Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto and his staff including Deputy Minister of Defense Wahyu Sakti Trenggon. The Defense Ministry and the national defense strategy that will be conveyed by Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto. "Matters relating to the Ministry of Defense's general policy can be conveyed in an open meeting. However, those related to the strategy and state secrets are certainly conveyed in private," he said. the inauguration of the House of Representatives Commission I with the Ministry of Defense will run smoothly, especially the public and the media are also awaiting the presence of Prabowo Subianto as Minister of Defense for I am present at the DPR. "As the chairman of the DPR's Commission I, I hope that this first working meeting will run smoothly. I also believe that the DPR's Commission I and Pak Prabowo Subianto will be able to carry out a good partnership and respect each other, "concluded Meutya.
